turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey I'd like a drink from the Starbucks on kitsap way in bremerton.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of what kind of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Something with caramel in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want a hot drink or a cold drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A cold drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay they have frappes, cold brew or iced lates.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a caramel frappe then please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok do you want the whip cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. What kind of non dairy milk do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have coconut milk, almond milk, and soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok can I get that with almond milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok a what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes are available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Tall (small), grande(medium), venti(large).

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so you want a venti carmel frappe sub almond milk and no whip cream is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to put that in right now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I put in your order at the Starbucks on kitsap way in bremerton.
